title: Build Prepared, Stay Safe
desc: Comprehensive disaster preparedness training for schools and colleges. Interactive learning, virtual drills, and real-time alerts.
compDesc: Everything your institution needs to build a culture of safety and emergency preparedness.
impactDesc: Track our progress in building safer educational communities.
trustDesc: Our platform meets the highest safety and educational standards.
ndmaDesc: Follows all National Disaster Management Authority (NDMA) guidelines and protocols.
expertDesc: Content developed and validated by safety and education experts.
updatesDesc: Continuously updated with latest safety protocols and guidelines.
cta: Ready to Build a Safer Campus?
ctaDesc: Join thousands of institutions already using our platform to protect their communities.
about_body: is an all-in-one digital platform to strengthen disaster preparedness in Indian schools and colleges. It turns static safety guidelines into
about_tail: institutions can track preparedness levels and drill participation effectively.
compStats: Comprehensive disaster preparedness training for educational institutions.
feature_quizzes_desc: Gamified learning modules covering earthquakes, floods, fire safety, and emergency response.
feature_drills_desc: Step-by-step emergency drill simulations with immersive scenarios and performance tracking.
feature_alerts_desc: Region-specific emergency notifications and weather warnings delivered instantly.
feature_contacts_desc: Quick access to local emergency services, school contacts, and safety resources.
feature_analytics_desc: Comprehensive insights into preparedness levels and drill performance metrics.
feature_chatbot_desc: 24/7 AI assistant providing instant guidance on emergency procedures.
subtitle: India's Disaster Awareness Platform
resources_desc: Download and keep these important safety guides for offline access
resources_offline: These resources are available offline once downloaded. Keep them handy for emergency situations.
resource_earthquake_desc: Comprehensive guide on earthquake preparedness and response procedures.
resource_fire_desc: Essential checklist for fire safety and evacuation procedures.
resource_flood_desc: Detailed manual for flood preparedness and emergency response.
